## Data Packages

#### NJ OAG Use Of Force Data Package for R
[NJOAGUOF](https://github.com/tor-gu/njoaguof/#readme)

This data package is a cleaned-up version of the NJ OAG Use of Force dataset available from https://www.njoag.gov/force/.

#### NJ OAG Law Enforcement Officer Diversity Data Package for R
[NJOAGLEOD](https://github.com/tor-gu/njoagleod#readme)

This data package is a cleaned-up version of the NJ OAG Law Enforcement Officer Diversity dataset available from https://www.njoag.gov/policerecruiting/

#### NJ Elections Data Package for R

[NJELECTIONS](https://github.com/tor-gu/njelections/#readme)

This is a data package for R containing the results of statewide elections in NJ, from 2004 to 2021.

#### NJ Municipalities Data Package for R

[NJMUNICIPALITIES](https://github.com/tor-gu/njmunicipalities#readme)

This is a data package for R that contains every county and municipality in New Jersey, from 2000 to 2022.

## APIs

#### NJ Municipalities API

[NJMUNICIPALITIES-API](/apis/njmunicipalities.html)

This is an API that exposes the data in the [NJMUNICIPALITIES data package for R](#nj-municipalities-data-package-for-r). The source code is [here](https://github.com/tor-gu/njmunicipalities-api)
